div.div: Latitudinal changes in the sea-ice drivers.
div.p: Medians of the empirical probability density functions from the 18 models (thin lines) and ensemble mean (thick lines) in the historical (1961–2005, blue lines) and RCP8.5 scenario (2061–2100, red lines) simulations for ( A) date of freeze-up, ( B) date of breakup, ( C) maximum sea-ice thickness, ( D) first-year ice extent, ( E) first month of snow cover, ( F) last month of snow cover, ( G) maximum snow depth, and ( H) minimum near-surface atmospheric temperature.
